# Segundo plot

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
mg <- read_excel("C:dados-diversos.xlsx")
```
:::


## Visualiza


::: {.cell hash='aula5_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_b22da6d073a554cb4dc2ff8c60611ca3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
p_box <- mg |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, comp))+
  #geom_point()+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.color = NA,
               fill = "orange",
               size = 0.5,
               width = 0.4)+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, 
              height = 0,
              size =2,
              color = "black")+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(7,19),
                     n.breaks = 6)+
  labs(y = "Lesion size (mm)",
       x = " ")+
  theme_bw()
p_box
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("figs/plot2.png",
         width = 4,
       height = 4,
       bg = "white")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula5_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_0e20c40970c9d4d02c208c145c7b5625'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggthemes)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: package 'ggthemes' was built under R version 4.2.3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
p_means <- mg |> 
  group_by(trat) |> 
  summarise(comp_mean = mean(comp),
            comp_sd = sd(comp)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, comp_mean))+
  #geom_col(fill = "orange",
   #        width = 0.5)+
  geom_point()+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(7,18),
                     n.breaks = 6)+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = comp_mean - comp_sd , 
                    ymax = comp_mean + comp_sd,
                    width = 0.05))+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(y = "Lesion size (mm)",
       x = " ")
p_means
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("figs/mean_sd.png",
       width = 4,
       height = 4,
       bg = "white")
```
:::


## composição de plots


::: {.cell hash='aula5_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_08205d8afb37682b1fa3a2c35c32e9bd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(patchwork)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: package 'patchwork' was built under R version 4.2.3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
(p_box | p_means) +
  plot_annotation(tag_levels = 'A',
                  title = 'Gráficos que impressionam')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("figs/combined.png")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Saving 7 x 5 in image
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula5_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_9825a6c6d613c36268223cdd1cbfabb8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
survey <- read_excel("C:dados-diversos.xlsx",
                     sheet = "survey")

survey |> 
  filter(state == "RS") |> 
  count(species, residue) |> 
  ggplot(aes(species, n))+
  geom_col(width = 0.4, 
           fill = "steelblue")+
   coord_flip()+
  facet_wrap(~residue, ncol = 1)+
  labs(x = "", y = "Number of isolates",
       title = "Horizontal bar plot",
       subtitle = "Using ggplot")+
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("figs/barplot.png", bg = "white")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Saving 7 x 5 in image
```
:::
:::
